text: Ra jaba hamra pharistaharu ‘‘lutako’’ najika a'e, ta, uniharuko karanale uni duhkhi bha'e ra manaimanama cintita bha'e. Pharistaharule bhaneh tapa'i ‘‘dara namannuhos ra duhkha pani namannuhos. Hami tapa'ila'i ra tapa'iko gharavalaharula'i baca'ihalne chaum, tara tapa'iki stri sajayako lagi pachi parneharumadhyeki huneche.’’
